name: DEJA VU (WhiskerGameJam 2022)
description:
Short, quite unpolished, project made for the Whisker game jam 2022.

Utilizing the Theme of 'No Way Back' and the limitation of having a feline in the game.

Features:

- Some progress happens regardless of whether you fail or not. (TimeLoop gimmick) - QTE 'battles'
- Press F5 to take your own screenshots.
- And technically more... Some of which is poorly utilized I have to admit.

After sleeping on this, really wish for more time.

Missing credits!

Music by Enterbrain ; and H/MIX

Also special thanks to somebody [ CleanWater ] on the RM forums for title idea.
